definitions.definition: A plant characterized by wood , bark and pith , the wood forming a layer between the other two, and growth only occurring on the outside.
The last phase of the hair growth cycle that follows telogen , during which the hairshaft is released from the hair follicle and is shed from the body.

main_definition: ( botany ) A plant characterized by wood , bark and pith , the wood forming a layer between the other two, and growth only occurring on the outside.
secondary_definitions: ( medicine , dermatology ) The last phase of the hair growth cycle that follows telogen , during which the hairshaft is released from the hair follicle and is shed from the body.
